reviews.text: L'emplacement de l'appartement et parfait pour visité Paris à pied. Charles est très compréhensible. Merci encore.
reviews.name: Zainab

reviews.text: Logement très fonctionnel et cosy en plein coeur de Paris ! Hôte accueillant. Une valeur sûre pour séjourner quelques jours en couple.
reviews.name: Daphnée

reviews.text: Personne très agréable, bonne communication, l'appartement est très propre , bien équipé, très moderne et décoré avec beaucoup de goût. Tout s'est bien passé. Je recommande vivement.
reviews.name: Sara

reviews.text: Logement très bien situé, Proche du métro. Remis à neuf récemment, c'est très propre et amenagé avec du bon goût. Charles est très accueillant et disponible pour la moindre requête. Nous avons passé un excellent séjour grâce à lui !
reviews.name: Thibaut

reviews.text: Au top! Nous avons été accueillis par Charles, qui a passé du temps à nous expliquer les lieux. L'appartement est grand, très bien agencé! Le lit est très confortable, le convertible aussi. Rien à redire si ce n'est que nous reviendrons!
reviews.name: Carole

reviews.text: Charles was very responsive and a wonderful host. He was careful to give us the details of the apartment and the local amenities. The four of us fit nicely (two adults and two teenagers). Shopping and tons of restaurants close by. Easy to get many of Paris' wonderful attractions. Would definitely stay here again!!
reviews.name: Bob

reviews.text: Beautiful apartment in a great location. Easily accommodated 4 guests. Highly recommended.
reviews.name: David

reviews.text: Charles was a fantastic host who met us at the door and showed us around the apartment. His place was beautiful and well-lit. He was always responsive and was very accommodating with our check-out time. Great location too!
reviews.name: Michelle

reviews.text: A great stay. Charles was super helpful and always on hand for any questions throughout our stay. The apartment is in an amazing central location but equally nice a quiet. Couldn't ask for more, highly recommend.
reviews.name: Jo

reviews.text: The sweet apartment is very nice and beautiful. We have a very good experience in Paris. Transaction is very convenient and house is quite at night.
reviews.name: Ran

reviews.text:
Charles was super good about changing plans to meet us. He made sure we understood how everything worked and made us feel comfortable. Even checked later to be sure everything was good. The apartment was comfortable and made us feel like we were in the heart of Paris. So glad we did not stay in the touristy area of Paris. Loved the beautiful Parisian designs of the flat and the beautiful wooden stairway that was good for a bit of exercise. Lots of restaurants and pubs just around the corner. Walking distance to Seine and Louvre. Easy to catch the Metro. Great stay!
+ Plus
reviews.name: Barbara

reviews.text: We had a wonderful visit. Thank you!
reviews.name: Tawnya

reviews.text: Stayed at Charles place for couple of days. It is very well located. Close to metro, super markets, malls and attractions. The house is very nice and comfy, really enjoyed our stay there. Charles is very helpful and provides all the info you need for the house as well as extra. Will def look for getting the same place if I visit Paris again.
reviews.name: Kunal

reviews.text: Family of 4. Charles was very efficient and welcoming. Location was great. Nice and quiet at night. Not loud at all. Close to the metro, super-market and restaurants. Clean, tidy and comfortable bed & sofa bed. Thank you Charles.
reviews.name: Bexii

reviews.text: The place was really great, and Charles went out of his way to help with various things from early check-ins to luggage storage. The flat has all the basics you need. Kitchen is not suitable for extensive cooking but I definitely made breakfast on several days. It's more of a hotel set up than living in someone's home, if you care about that. And the pillows aren't very comfortable but these are minor things. The location is great, too! I would stay again.
reviews.name: Chhavi

reviews.text: Great host, superb place. Clean and as advertised, location unbeatable
reviews.name: Cian

reviews.text: Wonderful location in the heart of the Marais. It was definitely cramped for four people but the fold out bed was surprisingly comfortable.
reviews.name: Cameron

reviews.text: Very nice place! Charles is a nice guy!
reviews.name: Kan

reviews.text: Great location in Paris! We walked to the best restaurants, bars, shops, clubs every day. Definitely recommend it! Charles is the sweetest too which was great :)
reviews.name: Rosalva

reviews.text: Perfect location Very comfortable place Charles tried to his best to help. Because of him we spent precious time in this locely city
reviews.name: Younggwang
